comment.author: 67219171@N06
comment._content: I was not aware of a Mennonite Church in Japan. This is the first Japan Mennonite Church photo I have seen.

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your post.  I wasn't aware of the Mennonite Church in Japan either until I started working in the archives!   If this is interesting to you, we have a couple of sets of missionary papers that might make for a good seminar paper, specifically the Rhoda and Ruth Ressler papers and the Lee and Adella Brunk Kanagy Papers.

comment.author: 7233777@N06
comment._content: Don McCammon is in the last row third from right.
